entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:01 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 06:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
